welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mount Clemens, a charming city known for its small-town feel and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that this beautiful place has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for military flights and personnel.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Detroit City Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Detroit City Airport serves primarily regional flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport with no time limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Windsor Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Windsor Airport serves flights to and from nearby cities in Canada.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pontiac Airport handles all commercial flights and includes amenities such as restaurants, shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pontiac Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering luxurious lounges and personalized services for its passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Clair County International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St Clair County International Airport is used for the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
